Description: A unique identifier for the language.

One of the following values, representing the member's proficiency in the language:    elementary limited-working professional-working full-professional native-or-bilingual   These values are meant to be used programmatically, as identifiers.  See 'proficiency:(name)' for a displayable version.

One of the following descriptive values, representing the member's proficiency in the language:    Elementary proficiency Limited working proficiency Professional working proficiency Full professional proficiency Native or bilingual proficiency
